question: Will Elon Musk attend the Super Bowl in 2025?
news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**OpenAI to Debut on TV with Super Bowl Commercial**
OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, will air its first TV commercial during the Super Bowl LIX, which takes place on Sunday, February 9, at the Caesars Superdome, home of the New Orleans Saints, according to a source close to the matter. This comes as the AI sector has seen significant investment in advertising, with companies like Google, Anthropic, and Microsoft investing $332 million in 2024, as reported by Reuters. Another AI company, Perplexity, will also be present at the Super Bowl, with a customized Tesla Cybertruck activation aimed at generating buzz on social media before the game. Perplexity was in negotiations with Fox, the game's broadcaster, for an official commercial, but instead invested around $3 million in adjacent marketing, filming a web series with sports influencers inside the company's Elon Musk-owned vehicle. The Super Bowl is a highly sought-after event for advertisers, with 123 million people expected to watch the 2024 game, surpassing the 2023 record of 115 million, according to Nielsen data. The price of a 30-second ad spot has exceeded $8 million, according to a source familiar with the negotiations.
Original language: pt
Publish date: February 06, 2025 07:32 PM
Source:[meioemensagem.com.br](https://www.meioemensagem.com.br/marketing/openai-publicidade-super-bowl)

**Super Bowl 2025: Everything You Need to Know About the Big NFL Final**
The US Secret Service has confirmed that they have deployed personnel to the Caesars Superdome to ensure the security of the Super Bowl 2025 event. According to spokesperson Anthony Guglielmi, 'security measures have been improved even further this year, as it will be the first time a sitting president attends the event'. Donald Trump is expected to give an interview with Bret Baier of Fox News, which will be recorded from Florida before the game. However, Trump has remained tight-lipped about his preference between the teams: 'I don't want to say it, but there's a certain quarterback who seems like a good winner', he said in reference to Patrick Mahomes, quarterback of the Chiefs. Lionel Messi has confirmed that he will be attending the event, despite being focused on the 2025 season with Inter Miami in the MLS. The news has generated a lot of excitement among fans and players, with Patrick Mahomes expressing his enthusiasm: 'Having someone of Messi's caliber watching the game will be incredible. I'm excited to show who I am and the talent I have', he said in a press conference. The presence of Messi adds to the already high-profile nature of the event, which will also feature a halftime show with Kendrick Lamar and SZA, and millions of viewers worldwide.
Original language: es
Publish date: February 06, 2025 02:45 PM
Source:[Perfil](https://www.perfil.com/noticias/protagonistas/super-bowl-2025-todo-lo-que-debes-saber-sobre-la-gran-final-de-la-nfl.phtml)

**OpenAI to Air First-Ever TV Commercial During Super Bowl**
OpenAI, the company behind the development of ChatGPT, is set to air its first-ever television commercial during the Super Bowl on February 9. According to sources, the company's brand has gained significant recognition since the release of ChatGPT in 2023, despite relying little on paid advertising. The Super Bowl commercial marks a significant milestone for OpenAI, which has become a prominent player in the AI industry without relying heavily on advertising. The move comes as the competition for building the world's strongest AI technology and acquiring users intensifies. The advertising space is dominated by major players such as Microsoft, Alphabet, Meta, and Amazon, as well as startups like Anthropic and xAI, backed by Elon Musk. New entrants, including Chinese company DeepMind, are also emerging in the market.

Publish date: February 06, 2025 03:42 AM

**What Celebrities Are Going to the Super Bowl 2025?**
Taylor Swift is likely to attend the Super Bowl 2025 as she has been dating Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce since 2023. She has been a regular at his games and even took a 12-hour private jet flight home from Japan to watch him win last year. Sheryl Crow, who performed at the Grammys and has a connection to Travis Kelce, is also expected to attend the big game this year. According to the article, 'It's likely she'll head to the big game this year, too.'

Publish date: February 05, 2025 06:37 PM
Source:[Hollywood Life](https://hollywoodlife.com/feature/celebrities-super-bowl-2025-5367598/)

**Donald Trump to Attend Super Bowl 2025, Enhanced Security Measures in Place**
Donald Trump will be the first US President to attend the Super Bowl live, as confirmed by the Secret Service. The President, a self-proclaimed fan of the Kansas City Chiefs, will attend the game between the Philadelphia Eagles and the Chiefs on February 9th in New Orleans. According to the Secret Service, 'extensive planning and coordination have been carried out to ensure the safety of all attendees, players, and staff.' The security measures have been enhanced this year due to Trump's attendance, as stated in a press release. Trump has expressed his support for the Chiefs in the past, saying, 'Congratulations. What a great team, coach, quarterback, and almost everything else, including those fantastic fans. Congratulations to the Buffalo Bills for a tremendous season. They're going to win a lot in the future!!!' When asked about the likely winner of the Super Bowl, Trump replied, 'I don't want to say, but there's a certain quarterback who seems like a good winner,' which is believed to be a reference to Patrick Mahomes. The increased security is also due to the recent attack in New Orleans on January 1st, where a man ran over dozens of people, killing 14.

Publish date: February 05, 2025 04:46 PM
Source:[FanSided](https://fansided.com/es/donald-trump-primer-presidente-estados-unidos-asistir-super-bowl)

**Taylor Swift to Attend Super Bowl 2025 to Support Travis Kelce**
Jason Kelce, brother of Travis Kelce, has confirmed that Taylor Swift will be attending the Super Bowl 2025 to support her boyfriend. The pop star has been supporting Travis Kelce and the Kansas City Chiefs throughout their season, but has not attended away games due to security concerns. According to Jason Kelce, 'I think everyone is going to come', referring to the Super Bowl being a family affair. He also mentioned that Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, along with their family and friends, will likely be in attendance. Taylor Swift has been planning her presence at the Super Bowl for some time, and is expected to support Travis Kelce from the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans, accompanied by her famous friends.

**Super Bowl 2025:  All you need to know about teams, performers, how and where to watch**
The Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles will face off in Super Bowl 2025 at the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans on February 9. Kendrick Lamar will headline the halftime show, with SZA as a special guest. The game will be broadcast by Fox and streamed on various platforms, including the Fox Sports app, Fubo, and Tubi. The NFL MVP award will be presented prior to the game on February 6 at the 14th annual NFL Honors ceremony, hosted by Snoop Dogg. President Donald Trump is expected to attend the game, marking the first appearance by a sitting president. Taylor Swift will likely attend the game, cheering on her boyfriend Travis Kelce.

**Top News in Mexico on February 4, 2025**
Mexico is expecting thunderstorms and possible hail in various states, according to the National Meteorological Service (SMN) and the National Water Commission (Conagua). Claudia Sheinbaum, the head of the Mexico City government, has not invited the Supreme Court of Justice of the Nation (SCJN) to the Constitution Day event, citing that they do not respect the Constitution. The Mexican Navy has clarified that three US military ships are sailing near the coast of Ensenada in a free navigation zone. A man wanted by the FBI for the murder of his wife in 2012 has been detained in Nuevo León. Sheinbaum has stated that the deployment of federal forces on the northern border does not leave the rest of Mexico unprotected. A riot and shootout at a prison in Tabasco has left seven dead. The US has started sending migrants to Guantanamo, but no Mexicans will be sent, according to Foreign Minister Juan Ramón de la Fuente. The White House has announced a one-month pause in tariffs for Mexico, and has outlined the agreement and its implementation. Elon Musk has claimed that the US financed the creation of COVID-19 in Chinese laboratories, citing USAID and the CIA. The government of Coahuila is urging the creation of fiscal policies to 'protect' the state's economy from the threat of tariffs. The state of Coahuila will deploy police and set up shelters on the border, and has coordinated with the federal government to strengthen security. Cruz Azul has won their first match in the Conchampions tournament, and is taking the lead against Real Hope. Grupo Firme will perform in Saltillo and Torreón, and will visit 10 states in Mexico. The NFL has denied accusations of favoritism towards the Chiefs, and has defended the impartiality of the referees. A party with Cardi B, Travis Scott, and Post Malone will take place before the Super Bowl, and will feature Diplo and DJ unKommon. An actress, possibly Luna Bella, has been reported to have been arrested for taking explicit photos in the Mexico City metro. Pre-inscriptions for basic education in Mexico are now open, and can be found in various states. Eight Mexican supermarkets can be found throughout the country, including Soriana, Chedraui, and La Comer.

**China strikes back at U.S. with tariffs, study finds nanoplastics in human brains, Eagles and Chiefs attend Opening Night**
China has imposed tariffs on US imports in response to the US tariffs on Chinese goods. Meanwhile, the US has agreed to a 30-day pause on tariffs for Canadian and Mexican imports after both countries agreed to take steps to address illegal immigration and drug trafficking. A new study has found that the average human brain may contain a plastic spoon's worth of nanoplastics, with concentrations rising dramatically from 2016 to 2024. The Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles attended Super Bowl Opening Night, where they discussed various topics. Two federal employee unions have sued the Treasury Department for giving Elon Musk and his DOGE team access to payment systems and taxpayer information. Army Corps crews in Washington, D.C. are recovering the wreckage from the American Airlines crash, and a new study suggests that the plane's nose came up just before the disaster. Experts have also discussed the afternoon slump, suggesting that it's normal to have a dip in energy in the afternoons, but that certain habits can also lead to this crash. They recommend eating balanced meals, going for a quick walk or doing some light stretching, and putting an upbeat song on to regain focus. Additionally, New York City has elected a new dog mayor, Simon, a 7-year-old basset-cattle-dog, who will spend the next two years promoting animal rescue and adoption.

**Super Bowl 2025: Details and Performer Announced**
The 59th edition of the Super Bowl will take place on February 9, 2025, at the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans, Louisiana. The event will start at 6:30 pm EST. The stadium has a capacity of 73,208 people for football games, but can accommodate up to 76,468 in special arrangements. Apple Music, the official sponsor of the Super Bowl, has announced that Kendrick Lamar will perform at the halftime show. Lamar previously performed at the halftime show in 2022, alongside Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, and other hip-hop legends. This time, he will perform solo. The NFL season will begin after the preseason, with the 32 teams competing in 16 games between January and February, followed by the playoffs and culminating in the Super Bowl 2025.

**Elon Musk Issues Job Invitation for 'Hardcore Software Engineers' to Build 'Super App'**
Elon Musk, the founder of Tesla and SpaceX, has issued a full-time job invitation on social media, calling for 'hardcore software engineers' to join him in building a 'super app'. Musk stated that he wants to recruit engineers who can submit their best code work, and participate in building a comprehensive application. Musk wrote, 'If you are a hardcore software engineer and want to participate in building a super app, please send your best work to code@x.com and join us.' He also added, 'We don't care where you graduated from, or whether you've ever attended school, or where you've worked at a 'big-name' company. Just show us your code.' Musk has been committed to transforming his social media platform X from a single social network platform to a multi-functional comprehensive platform, which he calls a 'super app'. He plans to integrate payment, instant messaging, e-commerce, and other functions, providing a one-stop solution similar to China's WeChat. X's CEO Linda Yaccarino recently announced that the platform will launch streaming and financial services before 2025. She posted on X, introducing new features such as 'X Money' and 'X TV', and stated that these features are part of the platform's plan to extend beyond social media interactions.

Publish date: January 17, 2025 01:05 AM
Source:[中关村在线](https://dcdv.zol.com.cn/939/9399783.html)

**TikTok's Uncertain Future in the US and the Rise of Streaming Sports**
The future of TikTok in the US is uncertain as the 'TikTok Law' is set to take effect on January 19, 2025, requiring the app to be removed from app stores. ByteDance, the company behind TikTok, is hoping for a last-minute reversal of the law, but experts believe the Supreme Court will not intervene. In response, ByteDance is considering suspending TikTok services in the US, which would leave users without access to trends and content. Meanwhile, Donald Trump has expressed interest in saving TikTok by vetoing the law, and Elon Musk has been mentioned as a potential buyer. Additionally, streaming platforms are increasingly being used to broadcast live sports events, with the Super Bowl LIX set to be streamed on Tubi in 2025. However, this trend raises concerns about user experience and potential anticompetitive practices by major sports networks. Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced the launch of a new region in Mexico, which is expected to boost business and innovation in the country. Finally, Creai Coders, a training initiative led by Franco Palacios, is working to equip young people with practical programming skills to meet the demands of the tech industry.

Publish date: January 16, 2025 08:40 AM
Source:[El Universal](https://www.eluniversal.com.mx/opinion/hugo-gonzalez/el-tic-tac-sobre-tiktok/)

**Cyril Hanouna to Attend 'Celebrate American Exceptionalism 2025' Event with Donald Trump and Elon Musk**
Cyril Hanouna, a French TV host, has announced that he will be attending a 'Celebrate American Exceptionalism 2025' event at Mar-a-Lago on February 18, where he will meet Donald Trump and Elon Musk. Hanouna revealed this information on his show 'Touche pas à mon poste' on January 13, stating that he will be attending a 'soirée' with Elon Musk. He later clarified that the event is not an interview, but rather a social gathering where he will meet the two men. The event is organized by America's Future, a conservative association known for promoting conspiracy theories. Hanouna's appearance at the event has sparked controversy, with some accusing him of paying $100,000 to attend the event and receive VIP services. However, his contact at Mar-a-Lago denied this, stating that Hanouna was invited as an 'honored guest' and that he was one of the names on the list. Hanouna also confirmed that he will meet Elon Musk, who is not officially announced as a guest at the event. This appearance comes just days before C8's exclusion from the TNT network, and may be seen as a final gesture by Hanouna before his show 'TPMP' leaves the airwaves.

The hosts of Free Beer and Hot Wings made their bold predictions for 2025. Free Beer predicted that by the end of the year, it will be difficult to tell if an AI video is real or fake, and that Ozempic/miracle weight loss will be deemed bad for you. **X to become a Super App in 2025 with new features and updates**
Elon Musk's company X is planning to become a super app in 2025, going beyond just a social media platform. The company aims to integrate various features such as digital payments, live streaming, on-demand TV content, and AI-powered chatbots. X's CEO, Linda Yacarino, said, '2024 was a year of change for X, and in 2025, we will connect users in new ways.' X Money, a digital payment service, will allow users to send and receive money securely and easily. X TV will provide live streaming, video sharing, and on-demand content, making X a hub for entertainment. GROK AI, an AI chatbot, will be updated with new features, enabling users to interact with the platform in a more personalized way. X's ecosystem will also include shopping, news, and social interaction features, making it a one-stop-shop for users' digital needs. Elon Musk's vision for X is to create a digital platform that offers a seamless and smart experience, going beyond just social media.

**X Aims to Become 'Super App' with Online Payment and TV Features**
Elon Musk's company X (formerly Twitter) is gearing up for a big bang in the new year. The company has set its sights on becoming a 'Super App' and has announced plans to introduce online payment and TV-like features this year. Users can also expect upgrades to the AI chatbot Grok. Musk wants X to become an 'everything app' where users don't need to download multiple apps for different services. According to X's CEO Linda Yaccarino, the company will connect users in new ways in 2025, building on the changes it made in 2024. This year, X will introduce TV, X Money, Grok, and more. The company has already created an official account for its payment service, @XMoney, which has gained over 1.53 lakh followers. While details about the service are scarce, experts believe it may incorporate digital assets like Dogecoin. X TV will revolutionize the multimedia experience on the platform, with users expected to enjoy live streaming and on-demand content. **The Guardian's Most Anticipated Documentaries of 2025**
The Guardian has selected the most anticipated documentaries of 2025, including 'Elon's Mask', which delves into the life of Elon Musk, from his technological endeavors to his controversies. The film, directed by Alex Gibney, who won an Academy Award for 'Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room', promises to be a thorough examination of Musk's career. Meanwhile, the tragic story of the 'Titanic' deep-sea exploration vessel, which sank in 2023, will also be featured in a documentary. The film will explore the five lives lost in the disaster through the testimonies of those who last met the crew. Other notable documentaries include 'Sly Lives!', which tells the story of funk legend Sly Stone, and 'United Healthcare CEO Incident', which exposes the structural problems behind the shocking CEO murder. Additionally, a documentary about Rihanna's life, which was acquired by Amazon for $25 million, is also expected to be released. The film, which features over 1,200 hours of footage, will showcase Rihanna's performances, including her Super Bowl show, as well as intimate moments. The documentary about NFL legend John Elway, 'Elway', will also be released on Netflix, exploring his life from his Super Bowl victories to his business ventures.

**Gazing into the crystal ball for 2025 | Blaze Media**
The author predicts several trends and stories for 2025, including: the success of the next 'Guardians of the Galaxy' film, a historic achievement for the Kansas City Chiefs and Detroit Lions in the Super Bowl, the return of the UFO psyop, Travis Kelce taking Taylor's last name, a peace deal between Russia and Ukraine, the weaponization of AI-generated content, the unsealing of national archives regarding the JFK assassination, and the potential for a strong start to President Trump's second term despite challenges within the GOP coalition. **Musk Attends Trump's New Year's Party, Discusses Goals for 2025**
Billionaire Elon Musk attended Donald Trump's New Year's gala party at his Mar-a-Lago residence in Florida. According to Reuters, other guests included US Senator Ted Cruz and other Trump supporters. Trump said, '2025 will be a great year, we will be fantastically successful as a country.' When asked about his goals for the new year, Cruz replied, 'I just want everyone to be happy, healthy, and prosperous.' Trump later took the stage and promised the crowd, 'We will do a great job as your president.' Trump's inauguration is scheduled for January 20. The New York Times reported that Musk rented a cottage at Mar-a-Lago and moved in after the US presidential election, allowing him easy access to Trump. Musk has been attending Trump's dinners, including a recent meeting with Amazon founder Jeff Bezos. Trump announced in November that Musk would lead a new commission on government efficiency, along with Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy. The commission will not be part of the US administration, but will interact with the White House.

**Elon Musk Predicts AI Will Surpass Human Intelligence by 2025 and All Humans by 2030**
Elon Musk predicts that artificial intelligence (AI) will surpass human intelligence by the end of 2025, and by 2030, it will surpass the collective intelligence of all humans. According to Musk, the probability of AI surpassing human intelligence by 2030 is 100%. Musk believes that AI will become so powerful that it will surpass the knowledge and abilities of all humans by 2027. He wrote on X, 'It is becoming increasingly likely that artificial intelligence will surpass the intelligence of any individual human by the end of 2025, and possibly all people by 2027/2028. The probability of AI surpassing the intelligence of all humans by 2030 is around 100%.' **Elon Musk's 2025 Prediction: A Superintelligent AI on the Horizon**
Elon Musk, the visionary entrepreneur behind Tesla, SpaceX, and Neuralink, has made a new prediction that has shaken the technological landscape. According to Musk, by 2025, a superintelligent artificial intelligence (AI) could emerge, surpassing human intelligence. This hypothesis raises concerns not only about the rapid development of technology but also about the ethical, social, and economic implications that follow. Musk has stated that AI is evolving much faster than expected, and if this growth continues, we may see the birth of machines with superior reasoning capabilities by next year. Musk has previously warned about the risks associated with AI, comparing its potential to apocalyptic scenarios like those depicted in the Terminator film series. However, this prediction is different because it is now imminent, not a distant future. Musk has highlighted the technological challenges related to this rapid development, including the consumption of resources. For example, training advanced models like Grok 2 required around 20,000 Nvidia chips, while the next version, Grok 3, will need 100,000 H100 chips. This data not only underscores the increasing computational power required but also raises questions about the environmental impact and accessibility of technological resources. Additionally, there are ethical concerns about an AI that could acquire a level of autonomy that would make it difficult for humans to control. Musk has often emphasized the need for strict regulation to ensure that AI is developed responsibly. The implications of this prediction are far-reaching, affecting not only the job market but also the economy and society as a whole. Musk has suggested that, in the event of widespread automation, a universal basic income might be necessary to support those affected by technological unemployment. The growth of a superintelligent AI could also fundamentally alter the balance of power between nations, companies, and individuals, creating new geopolitical dynamics. As Musk's prediction suggests, the question is no longer 'if' but 'when'. This prediction is not only a warning but also an opportunity to reflect on how to manage this extraordinary transformation. If preparing for the worst means acting today for a safer tomorrow, then it is our duty to face these challenges with foresight and responsibility.
Original language: it
Publish date: December 13, 2024 01:36 PM
Source:[supereva.it](https://www.supereva.it/elon-musk-accadra-nel-2025-previsione-agghiacciante-sullintelligenza-artificiale-ci-prepariamo-al-peggio-90758)

**Elon Musk's SpaceX Powers Up Super Heavy Rocket for Critical 7th Test**
Elon Musk's SpaceX has successfully completed a static-fire test of the Super Heavy booster, a crucial milestone for the upcoming seventh test flight of its Starship Megarocket. The test, which saw all 33 Raptor engines ignited, is a significant step towards the launch, which is currently targeted for January 11, 2025, although an official date has yet to be confirmed. The Starship Megarocket, consisting of the Super Heavy booster and the upper stage, Starship, aims to make space travel more accessible and convenient, with the potential for crewed flights to Mars. SpaceX aims to continue refining its launch procedures and enhance the reliability of its systems with each test flight.
Original language: en
Publish date: December 10, 2024 09:27 AM
Source:[republicworld.com](https://www.republicworld.com/world-news/elon-musk-spacex-powers-up-super-heavy-rocket-for-critical-7th-test)

forecasters.initial_reasoning: Elon Musk is a high-profile figure known for attending major public events occasionally. Historically, the probability of high-profile individuals like Elon Musk attending major national events such as the Super Bowl is moderate given its status as a major cultural and networking event in the United States. However, Elon Musk's attendance at events is less predictable than other celebrities or business figures as it often depends on his personal and business schedules rather than publicity needs. A reasonable base rate can be estimated by considering the attendance of culturally influential entrepreneurs at major national events. This historically tends to be around 25%.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Networking Opportunities
